message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $16,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $16,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping for. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
